title: Kumail Nanjiani | Democrats Win in New Jersey; QAnon Supporters Await JFK Jr’s Return: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at Republicans hoping to repeat the strategy they used in Virginia by keeping Donald Trump’s extreme far-right base on board while also appealing to moderates and swing voters in the 2022 midterms.

Then, Kumail Nanjiani talks about creating a podcast with his wife, avoiding liquids on the set of Eternals and his parents' approval of the film.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
